RelatedSentence: A YOUTH group , Urhobo Youth Leaders Association , has condemned the abduction of more than 200 school girls from Government Secondary School , Chibok , Borno State by Boko Haram insurgents over a month ago .
The group in a statement by its President , Comrade Francis Arhiyor , described the act as unreligious and barbaric , and called on the sect members to release the girls unconditionally .
